Class IndexController

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Controller.IndexController
public class IndexController extends Object
This class is the controller of the index start page

update: December 28th

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    ExitGame(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This function allows the player to exit the game.
    void
    initialize()
    This is the initialize function for the Index pages' basic setting.
    It contains the default value for background music and the button clicking music.
    It contains the view adjustment for the scene components because they are designed to be resizable.
    It contains the initialization of the music slider's volume.
    void
    OnChangeVolume(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This function allows the slider to be seen when the player is changing the volume.
    void
    OnClickedVolume(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This function sets the slider to be visible and allows the user to set the volume using the slider.
    void
    OnHoverVolume(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This function resets the music icon to a new position and gives place for the slider.
    private void
    prefButtonAdjust()
    This function is a helper function to adjust the button's size and make the class more maintainable.
    void
    ShowInstructions(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This function allows the player to see the instruction page.
    void
    ShowOptions(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This function allows the player to choose the theme and game settings.
    void
    ShowRank(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This function allows the player to go to the rank page.
    void
    StartGame(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    This function allows the player to the game start page.
    private void
    viewerAdjust()
    This function adjusts the view component to the background by binding property.
    It allows the scene to be resizable.

  • Constructor Details

    • IndexController

      public IndexController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This is the initialize function for the Index pages' basic setting.
      It contains the default value for background music and the button clicking music.
      It contains the view adjustment for the scene components because they are designed to be resizable.
      It contains the initialization of the music slider's volume.

    • viewerAdjust

      private void viewerAdjust()
      This function adjusts the view component to the background by binding property.
      It allows the scene to be resizable.

    • prefButtonAdjust

      private void prefButtonAdjust()
      This function is a helper function to adjust the button's size and make the class more maintainable.

    • StartGame

      public void StartGame(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This function allows the player to the game start page.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - activated when the mouse is clicked

    • ShowInstructions

      public void ShowInstructions(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This function allows the player to see the instruction page.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - activated when the mouse is clicked

    • ShowOptions

      public void ShowOptions(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This function allows the player to choose the theme and game settings.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - activated when the mouse is clicked

      public void ExitGame(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This function allows the player to exit the game.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - activated when the mouse is clicked

    • OnClickedVolume

      public void OnClickedVolume(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This function sets the slider to be visible and allows the user to set the volume using the slider.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - activated when the mouse is clicked

    • OnHoverVolume

      public void OnHoverVolume(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This function resets the music icon to a new position and gives place for the slider.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - activated when the mouse is hovered

    • OnChangeVolume

      public void OnChangeVolume(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      This function allows the slider to be seen when the player is changing the volume.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - activated when the mouse is clicked
